name: Dialog.Header
description: Component for displaying the header of a popup dialog

props.name: leadingAccessory
props.description: Pass to render a leading element

props.name: trailingAccessory
props.description: Pass to render a trailing element

props.name: contentContainerStyle
props.description: Style for the leading + content + trailing components (without the bottomAccessory)

props.name: onPress
props.description: onPress callback for the inner content

props.name: bottomAccessory
props.description: Pass to render a bottom element below the input
